languages.text: "Не ради моих собратьев, элантах. Я... прошу сделать это ради меня. Быть может, тебе... Нет, нам удастся убедить твоего звездного соперника остановить бессмысленное кровопролитие".

traits.locale_text: "Не ради моих собратьев, элантах. Я... прошу сделать это ради меня. Быть может, тебе... Нет, нам удастся убедить твоего звездного соперника остановить бессмысленное кровопролитие".
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Not for the sake of my kin, elantach. I... am asking you to do this for me. Perhaps you... perhaps we might convince your star rival to stop the meaningless bloodshed."
languages.original_text: "Не ради моих собратьев, элантах. Я... прошу сделать это ради меня. Быть может, тебе... Нет, нам удастся убедить твоего звездного соперника остановить бессмысленное кровопролитие".

traits.locale_text: "Not for the sake of my kinspeople, elantach. I... am asking you to do this for me. Perhaps you— perhaps we might convince your star rival to stop the meaningless bloodshed."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Not for the sake of my kin, elantach. I... am asking you to do this for me. Perhaps you... perhaps we might convince your star rival to stop the meaningless bloodshed."

traits.locale_text: "Not for the sake of my kin, elantach. I... am asking you to do this for me. Perhaps you... perhaps we might convince your star rival to stop the meaningless bloodshed."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “这不是为了我的族人，外界人。是我……是我请求你为我做这件事情。或许你……或许我们可以想办法说服你强大的对手，让他停止这场无谓的杀戮。”
languages.original_text: "Not for the sake of my kin, elantach. I... am asking you to do this for me. Perhaps you... perhaps we might convince your star rival to stop the meaningless bloodshed."

traits.locale_text: “这不是为了我的族人，外界人。是我……是我请求你为我做这件事情。或许你……或许我们可以想办法说服你强大的对手，让他停止这场无谓的杀戮。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Nicht wegen meiner Verwandten, Elantach. Ich ... bitte Euch, das für mich zu tun. Vielleicht könnt Ihr ... vielleicht können wir Euren Sternenrivalen überzeugen, dem sinnlosen Blutvergießen ein Ende zu bereiten."
languages.original_text: "Not for the sake of my kin, elantach. I... am asking you to do this for me. Perhaps you... perhaps we might convince your star rival to stop the meaningless bloodshed."

traits.locale_text: "Nicht wegen meiner Verwandten, Elantach. Ich ... bitte Euch, das für mich zu tun. Vielleicht könnt Ihr ... vielleicht können wir Euren Sternenrivalen überzeugen, dem sinnlosen Blutvergießen ein Ende zu bereiten."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: «No lo hagas por el bien de mis congéneres, elantach. Yo... te pido que lo hagas por mí. Tal vez tú... tal vez ambos podamos convencer a tu rival estelar de que cese ese derramamiento de sangre sin sentido».
languages.original_text: "Not for the sake of my kin, elantach. I... am asking you to do this for me. Perhaps you... perhaps we might convince your star rival to stop the meaningless bloodshed."

traits.locale_text: «No lo hagas por el bien de mis congéneres, elantach. Yo... te pido que lo hagas por mí. Tal vez tú... tal vez ambos podamos convencer a tu rival estelar de que cese ese derramamiento de sangre sin sentido».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « Non, elantach. Je ne vous demande pas de faire cela pour les miens, mais... pour moi. Peut-être que vous... que nous pourrons convaincre votre rival stellaire de mettre un terme à ce bain de sang inutile. »
languages.original_text: "Not for the sake of my kin, elantach. I... am asking you to do this for me. Perhaps you... perhaps we might convince your star rival to stop the meaningless bloodshed."

traits.locale_text: « Non, elantach. Je ne vous demande pas de faire cela pour les miens, mais... pour moi. Peut-être que vous... que nous pourrons convaincre votre rival stellaire de mettre un terme à ce bain de sang inutile. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「我が同胞のためではない、エランタ。私は…私のためにそうして欲しいと頼んでいる。あなたなら…我々ならもしかしたら敵を説得して無意味な血を流すことを止められるかもしれない」
languages.original_text: "Not for the sake of my kin, elantach. I... am asking you to do this for me. Perhaps you... perhaps we might convince your star rival to stop the meaningless bloodshed."

traits.locale_text: 「我が同胞のためではない、エランタ。私は…私のためにそうして欲しいと頼んでいる。あなたなら…我々ならもしかしたら敵を説得して無意味な血を流すことを止められるかもしれない」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Soyum için değil elantach. Bunu benim için yapmanı rica ediyorum. Belki sen... Belki biz, büyük rakibini anlamsız katliamına son vermeye ikna edebiliriz."
languages.original_text: "Not for the sake of my kin, elantach. I... am asking you to do this for me. Perhaps you... perhaps we might convince your star rival to stop the meaningless bloodshed."

traits.locale_text: "Soyum için değil elantach. Bunu benim için yapmanı rica ediyorum. Belki sen... Belki büyük rakibini anlamsız katliamına son vermeye ikna edebiliriz."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
